text: @DineshDSouza @realDonaldTrump COVID-19 often causes neurological symptoms, including delirium.  Maybe your hypothetical person wouldn’t have crashed without the infection. “Influenza-associated” deaths are counted in the same way as COVID-19 deaths, so you should probably let this unoriginal talking point go. https://t.co/NOowUgqiL0

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
